title: One Piece: Alabasta Arc Review
author: Two Piece Podcast
description: Ant and Travis review the Alabasta arc, discussing the major battles, character development, and story significance. They cover topics including the Luffy vs Crocodile fights and the climactic resolution of the arc.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for the entire Alabasta arc including the conclusion

title: Episode 103: One Piece-Alabasta Arc (Part 1)
author: Weeb and Noob Watch Anime Podcast
description: First part of a multi-episode discussion of the Alabasta arc. The hosts discuss the setup, character introductions, and early battles of the arc.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for the Alabasta arc

title: E141: The End of Alabasta
author: Volume One Podcast
description: Discussion focused on the conclusion of the Alabasta arc, covering chapters 187-217. Analyzes the climactic battles, resolution of the civil war, and the arc's impact on the overall One Piece story.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for the end of the Alabasta arc

title: Every Luffy Vs. Crocodile Fight in One Piece & The Winner
author: CBR Editorial Team
description: Detailed breakdown of all three battles between Luffy and Crocodile during the Alabasta arc, analyzing the progression of the fights and Luffy's strategic evolution.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for all Luffy vs Crocodile battles including the conclusion

title: One Piece: Should Luffy Have Lost To Crocodile?
author: Game Rant
description: Critical analysis examining whether Luffy's victory over Crocodile was narratively justified, discussing the power scaling and strategic elements of their battles.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for the Luffy vs Crocodile fight conclusion

title: This Is the Best 'One Piece' Fight
author: Collider
description: Article discussing the greatest fights in One Piece history, with significant focus on the Luffy vs Crocodile third battle and its impact on the series.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for fights throughout the entire One Piece series

title: One Piece: The 10 Best Episodes Of The Alabasta Arc (According To IMDb)
author: CBR
description: Ranking of the top-rated Alabasta arc episodes based on IMDb scores, with episode 126 (the conclusion of Luffy vs Crocodile) ranking as the highest-rated episode of the arc.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains information about highly-rated episodes throughout the Alabasta arc
